overview: Last summer, I like to think about it on a day like today. Last summer was my best so far. The winter had been long, gray, cold, and horny. I longed for the summer in California. I could hardly wait to add to my collection mementos. My mementos, my trophies are these photographs of my California summer, to remind me of the men who shared their most intimate and private moments with me. The men who showed me their most secret things. The men I found and who found me in Laguna last summer... My Summer Trophies.
title: Summer Trophies
